metadata.title: Designer Skin Smile! You're Dark, 13.5-Ounce Bottle
features: Dark bronzing intensifier delivers beautiful, dark golden color
Utilizes Opti-Glow Blend for a healthy, radiant glow
Enriched with natural botanical oils and vita-nutrients for optimal appearance
description: Smile! You're Dark! Dark Tanning Bronzing Accelerator Type: Bronzer / Level: Builder What makes you smile? Gorgeous bronze color reminiscent of a Caribbean vacation? Silky, soft skin reminiscent of a baby? Looking in the mirror and feeling fabulous? Well, get ready to smile for all the above reasons with Smile! You’re Dark! Bronzing Accelerator. They say laughter is contagious, but we actually think “smiles” are now catching on…So, let the sunshine in and get ready to grin! * Dark bronzing intensifier delivers beautiful, dark golden color * Utilizes Opti-Glow Blend for a healthy, radiant glow * Enriched with natural botanical oils and vita-nutrients for optimal appearance SUITABLE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES! Fragrance: Sparkling Honey Size: 400 mL 13.5 Oz.
